EmailTemplate.name: Corp Comm.3-25-15 CF Summit
EmailTemplate.subject: CF Summit Sponsor Passes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Team,
As you know, CF Summit <http://www.cfsummit.com> is planned this year for May 11-12 in Santa Clara, CA. This will be an excellent opportunity for us to move Pivotal Cloud Foundry deals forward with talks from the Cloud Foundry ecosystem, and a stellar lineup of Pivotal CF customer speakers including Lockheed Martin, Verizon, Allstate Insurance, Humana, Kroger and more.
We have arranged a 25% discount off the $250 ticket price with the Cloud Foundry Foundation, using discount code CFS15CUS. I strongly encourage you to take advantage of this discount code with your inflight deals. In addition, for opportunities over $1Million, we have arranged for a limited number of sponsored free tickets. Please contact Kim-Marie Ruquet <mailto:kruquet@pivotal.io> to register your deals and obtain the sponsor code.
Looking forward to CF Summit setting us up nicely for a solid 2015.
Be Bold,
